trans-unit.source: Controls access to network information and traffic statistics for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 控制對本機電腦之網路資訊及流量統計資料的存取。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This permission is used to secure data returned by the classes in the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 此權限用來保護資料中的類別所傳回<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For declarative security, use the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermissionAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 宣告式安全性，使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermissionAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an unrestricted permission object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立不受限制的權限物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> 值來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The permission created by this constructor can be used to secure access to network information.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式所建立的權限可用來保護網路資訊的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a permission object that controls access to network information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立控制存取權限物件網路資訊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The permission created by this constructor can be used to secure access to network information.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式所建立的權限可用來保護網路資訊的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an unrestricted permission object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立不受限制的權限物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of access to network information controlled by this permission.
trans-unit.target: 取得由這個使用權限所控制之網路資訊的存取層級。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission> created with <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted?displayProperty=nameWithType> is given <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping> | <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Read> access.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission>以建立<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping> | <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Read>存取。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission> created with <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> is given <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.None> access.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission>以建立<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.None>存取。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission>, adds a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess> value to it, and displays the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission>，新增<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess>值，並顯示這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified value to this permission.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值加入至這個使用權限。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to modify access to network information by adding to the state of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來修改存取網路的資訊加入至目前的權限狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an empty permission object and then adds to it.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立空的權限的物件，並將它。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of this permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回這個使用權限的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> that is identical to the current permission
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" />，與目前的使用權限完全相同

trans-unit.source: A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates copy of a permission object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立權限物件複本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> that contains the XML encoding to use to set the state of the current permission
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" />，包含用來設定目前使用權限狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of this permission using the specified XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 編碼方式，設定這個使用權限的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the security system and is not normally called by application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是由安全性系統，而且通常不會呼叫應用程式碼。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityElement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityElement" /> is not a permission encoding.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 不是使用權限編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="securityElement" /> is not an encoding of a <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> 的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="securityElement" /> has invalid <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 含有無效的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" /> to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 與目前使用權限交集的 <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" />，表示目前使用權限和指定之使用權限的交集。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty or <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集是空的，或 <paramref name="target" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則這個新使用權限便為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 兩個權限交集是描述的狀態兩者共同描述的權限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a permission object that is the intersection of existing permission objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立交集的現有權限物件的權限物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" /> that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要測試其子集關聯性 (Relationship) 的 <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission
trans-unit.target: 這個使用權限與目前的使用權限必須屬於相同型別

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a state that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 目前權限是指定權限的子集，如果目前權限指定全部包含的指定權限的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns true, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回 true，如果目前權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the subset relationship between two permissions.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示子集之間的關聯性兩個權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission is created using the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立不受限制的使用權限<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a permission object and displays its state.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立權限物件，並顯示其狀態。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the state of this permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個使用權限狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> that contains the XML encoding of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" />，包含目前使用權限的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the security system and is not normally called by application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是由安全性系統，而且通常不會呼叫應用程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限合併的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission" /> 權限。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of this permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用權限，做為這個使用權限和指定之使用權限的聯集。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission.Union%2A> method returns a permission that represents all the states represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission.Union%2A>方法會傳回代表權限的所有狀態，表示目前權限和指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a permission object that is the union of existing permission objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立現有的權限物件的聯集的權限物件。
